import React from 'react'; import axios from 'axios'; class PlayerForm extends React.Component { submitPlayer(event){ event.preventDefault() axios.post("http://localhost:4000/players",{ firstName: this.refs.firstName.ariaValueMax, lastName: this.refs.lastName.ariaValueMax, email: this.refs.email.ariaValueMax, phone: this.refs.phone.ariaValueMax, offense: this.refs.offense.ariaValueMax, defense: this.refs.defense.ariaValueMax, speed: this.refs.speed.ariaValueMax, shooting: this.refs.shooting.ariaValueMax, isCoach: this.refs.isCoach.ariaValueMax }) } render() { return (

Add a new Player

); } } export default PlayerForm;
